Question: Sunia Technology Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Sunia Technology Inc

Product: Handwriting Recognition SDK

- Cutting-edge Handwriting Recognition, Digital Ink, and OCR capabilities
- Revolutionizing the Education Sector and AEC industry
- Compatible with Office for easier input of formulas and equations
- Capable of converting physical quantities, chemical reactions, matrices, and equation systems to LaTeX and MathML formats
- Variety of SDKs for handwriting recognition and document editing
- Serves Education Institutions, Finance & Law Offices, Healthcare & Pharma, Government Offices
- Established in 2011, dedicated to accelerating collaboration through machine learning algorithms
- Values Collaboration, Customers, Innovation, Shared Prosperity, Responsibility
Summary_cn:
Sunia Technology Inc

产品：手写识别软件开发工具包

- 尖端的手写识别、数字墨迹和OCR功能
- 革新教育部门和建筑工程行业
- 兼容Office，输入公式和方程更容易
- 能够将物理量、化学反应、矩阵和方程系统转换为LaTeX和MathML格式
- 提供各种用于手写识别和文档编辑的软件开发工具包
- 为教育机构、金融和法律机构、医疗和制药行业、政府机构提供服务
- 成立于2011年，致力于通过机器学习算法加速协作
- 价值观：协作、客户、创新、共同繁荣、责任
